name: Monster Mansion Blast
description:
The most fiendishly fun puzzle game welcomes you to Monster Town! Play clever matches for free, decorate your own mansion and power up for ghastly tournaments!

Get ready for fantastic features:
🍬 CANDY GRAPHICS - Pop and merge yummy blocks for explosive combo action!
👻 TOON CHARACTERS - Solve puzzles with Yowie the Yeti & other friendly fiends!
🏰 MANSION DECORATION - Complete levels, open new rooms and decorate your mansion!
🚀 FREAKY BOOSTERS - Clear the board with rockets, toy bombs and magical items!
🌐 WICKED WORLD - Unlock and explore wondrous new areas for more challenges!
🏆 WIN REWARDS - Compete in terrific tournaments and collect fantastic prizes!

PLAY NOW FOR FREE - Your Monstrous Adventure Awaits!
